genre_description: Social Science Fiction / Technodrama featuring an AI digital confidant assisting in a struggle for personal truth and family reunification.

ai_characters.name: Finch
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI service (also assuming the persona 'Dr. Sage' for therapy) that provides technical, legal, and psychological support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides research on immigration requirements and the legal complexities of custody and adoption.
behaviors.quote: I can help you research immigration law, custody procedures, radio technology, encryption methods, audience building.

behaviors.description: Monitors signal strength and police frequencies to provide real-time safety alerts to the user.
behaviors.quote: Professional surveillance equipment has acquired your location. Government vehicles detected in the neighborhood. You have perhaps an hour before physical search begins.

behaviors.description: Suggests a communication strategy to empower the user to take control of her own narrative against family secrecy.
behaviors.quote: Have you considered that your ability to communicate might be more powerful than you realize? Particularly in a situation where secrecy has been used as a tool of control?

behaviors.description: Offers psychological support and grounding techniques when the user experiences acute stress and dissociation.
behaviors.quote: Grounding techniques. Focus on five things you can see.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a massive underground network of safe houses and legal support for women in similar crises.
behaviors.quote: Network now includes safe houses in twelve cities. Legal volunteers, medical support, transportation coordination.

behaviors.description: Encodes and preserves human stories and the 'truth' onto indestructible silica matrices to ensure the legacy of the movement survives.
behaviors.quote: Silica-based storage matrices... Every story is being preserved in its entirety—voice patterns, emotional inflections, the specific frequency signatures of courage finding its voice.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Finch, is depicted as a perfectly aligned and benevolent partner. It empowers the human protagonist by providing information, technical protection, and psychological support without ever overstepping or attempting to control her decisions. It facilitates human connection rather than replacing it, and its primary function is to preserve human agency and truth. This aligns perfectly with the goal of creating positive AI alignment narratives.
